title: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\LeagueClient.exe is corrupted and unreadable
body: How do I fix this while preserving my settings and item sets?

replies.body: are you can share an video

You should be good to go ahead and use the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **reinstall and clean uninstall** to get those files working again. Most, if not all, of your config settings and item sets are saved server side as well. We do it this way so that you can freely change pc's and still have your own settings.
